alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Jim Wells; Kleberg Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 11:46AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN DUVAL...SOUTHWESTERN NUECES...SOUTHWESTERN JIM WELLS AND KLEBERG COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM CDT... At 1146 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near San Jose to near Riviera to 11 miles south of Malaquite Beach. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingsville, Alice, Falfurrias, San Diego, Premont, Benavides, Bishop, San Jose, Concepcion, Riviera, Realitos, La Gloria, Pleasant Park, Rios, Kingsville Naval Air Station, Riviera Beach, Ricardo, La Colonia Park, Ramirez, and Malaquite Beach. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 674 and 708. US Highway 77 between mile markers 684 and 708. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Jim Wells; Kleberg Islands
